name: Drow
level1: Darkvision 120 feet; know Dancing Lights cantrip.

name: High Elf
level1: Know Prestidigitation cantrip; can swap cantrip from Wizard list on Long Rest.

name: Forest Gnome
level1: Know Minor Illusion cantrip; Speak with Animals prepared; cast it PB times per long rest.

name: Rock Gnome
level1: Know Mending and Prestidigitation; can build tiny clockwork devices with Prestidigitation.

name: Abyssal
level1: Resist poison; know Poison Spray cantrip.

name: Chthonic
level1: Resist necrotic; know Chill Touch cantrip.

name: Infernal
level1: Resist fire; know Fire Bolt cantrip.
